Title: A Light in the Dark
Description:
Something is very wrong. As the battle continues, each side has become more aggressive.

Alleria seems to know something - she ran off at one point during the battle. We've been giving chase, but I cannot leave these soldiers to die. She's just ahead, we can reconvene with her together.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Anduin and chase down Xal'atath.
RewardText: Khadgar will need immediate help. We will have time for celebrations later.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Anduin to chase down Xal'atath
